Package ws

Package that contains the classes that implement the Wumpus Server, a server that simulates the Wumpus World.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Constants Constants used in the wumpus world.
 

Class Summary
Agent The wumpus server's model of an agent - an explorer of a wumpus - in the wumpus' world.
Explorer The wumpus server's model of an explorer in the wumpus' world.
Perceptions A set of perceptions an agent has in the wumpus world.
Room A room in the cave of the wumpus' world.
Tag Class that represents a XML tag.
Wumpus The wumpus server's model of a wumpus in the wumpus' world.
WumpusServer The server for the wumpus world game.
WumpusServer.AgentClient Auxiliar class used to store the agent clients connected to this server.
WumpusServer.Client Auxiliar class used to store the clients connected to this server.
WumpusWorld The world of wumpus, a monster that lives in a rectangular cave, with several rooms.
 

Exception Summary
BumpException Exception thrown when an agent tries to walk into a wall in the wumpus' world.
NoArrowException Exception thrown when an agent tries to shoot but he hasn't any arrow to do so.
NoGoldException Exception thrown when an agent tries to grab the bar of gold in a room where there's no such bar.
NoSpaceException Exception thrown when an agent tries to enter the wumpus world, but there is no space where it can enter safely.
 

Package ws Description

Package that contains the classes that implement the Wumpus Server, a server that simulates the Wumpus World.
